name: google-books
description: React-based Google Books Search app. That will query and display books based on user searches. Users can save books to review or purchase later.

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: Larry To
